is it safe to do an upgrade 11.04> 11.10: a recent GoUbuntu poll put safe upgrades at about 90%. Doesn't mean you won't be one of the 10% who has prblems...
it will upgrade any app that has an entry in the Oneiric repo. You may have problems with apps that do not have an Oneiric package. VLC was fine for me. It was not deleted.
I found it forced Unity3d on me, but it was a simple case of changing the default session back again
